Sentence Structure.sentenceLength: Varied lengths, predominantly short to medium
Sentence Structure.useOfLists: Frequent use of lists in topics and learnings

Rhetorical Patterns.storytellingStyle: Conversational with an emphasis on personal narratives

Unique Stylistic Elements.signaturePhrases: Use of informal greetings and exclamations (e.g., 'Woo.')
Unique Stylistic Elements.paragraphStructure: Short paragraphs, often broken up by dialogue

connectionMethods: Use of questions to provoke thought
Encouragement to engage on social media
